Name: Honey Cobbler
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Goblet glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig and berries.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Dry wine tannins and smoky scotch balance rich honey and blackcurrant liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Cobbler contains 172 calories
